title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 152.9 - Nonapplicable situations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 152.9 - Nonapplicable situations

State Regulations

Notwithstanding any of the foregoing provisions of this Part, the provisions of this Part shall not apply to the following: (a) officers or employees paid on a
fee-schedule basis; (b) officers or
employees whose salaries are prescribed by section
40, 60
or
169
of the

Executive Law; (c) officers or
employees in collective negotiating units established pursuant to article 14 of
the Civil Service Law; (d) employees allocated to salary grades the salary of which is determined by
application of the salary schedule contained in paragraph b of subdivision 1 of
section
130
of the

Civil Service Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
152.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
